ABOUT_GENERAL: The goal of this page is to bring Tolkien’s wonderful world to life on screen. It introduces the most famous locations and kingdoms of Middle-earth to visitors through a web map application. This project is purely fan-made; all information is based on the books and the movies. I do not own any of the visual materials used. The images shown in the gallery are the property of Warner Bros. The basemap was created by kapitan_ryjek. The 3D model of the One Ring was created by berzerkey.
ABOUT_DETAILS: This project was built using Angular @21 and NestJS @10. Spatial data visualization is handled by MapLibre @ 5.15. The georeferencing of the raster basemap and the creation of the vector layers were processed in QGIS. For the Chat function, the gpt-4.1 OpenAI model is being used.
